item.title: Working shop on a deltabased server, not working? heres code!
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

Shop code:
shop = 45 The_cool_Doorman 2 2 35 10 6570 10

Autospawn Code:
spawn = 33 2779 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1

Client.Java Code:

		} else if (NPCID == 33) {
			// Alerna
			PutNPCCoords = true;
			WanneShop = 45; // Repalcement for miles..

Q: I get no errors, everything seems to work fine. Except when i log in and try to “Talk” to the npc it will not take me
into the trade screen, i tryed this with a npc that had the “Trade” option and it worked fine. but i need it to trade with the “talk” option what can i do??

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2009, 11:04:41 am[/size][hr]Bump some one please help
